extendedInfo.description: Do you enjoy using Facebook website? Would you like to get the best of it by using both the Mobile and the full Desktop version? If the answer is yes, then FWebLauncher (Facebook Web Launcher) is the right app for you!MAIN FEATURES:- use the Facebook full desktop website like on your PC or Mac- switch ON THE FLY between the Mobile and the Desktop version of Facebook (choose the one you like the most and switch to the other anytime if you need it)- open Facebook in your web browser (WB launch mode) or in the internal FWebLauncher browser (FWL launch mode) for an easier interaction- tabbed browsing in the internal FWebLauncher browser (FWL launch mode)- save your favorite Facebook links for a quick access (are you checking a Page or a Profile frequently to have information about an event or keep in touch with a friend? Just save a link to them for immediate access!)- HTTPS encryption support (if it doesn't work for you, disable it in the "Settings" screen)NOTE:- FWebLauncher works best with the standard Android web browser or with Dolphin browser in the WB launch mode- it is recommended to watch the video guide to learn how FWebLauncher works (watch it in HQ, it's an HD video)- some links in the desktop version of Facebook might not be available in the mobile one because the Facebook platform doesn't make available all the features in the mobile version- FWebLauncher is free, but ad-supportedPERMISSIONS DESCRIPTION:- INTERNET and ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: used by the internal web browser (FWL launch mode) and to display the ads- WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: used to write the internal browser cache on the SD or to write other settings files- ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION and ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION: used to get the device position to allow Facebook check-ins in the internal web browser (you can disable the position tracking in the "Settings" screen)- WAKE_LOCK: used by the internal web browser (FWL launch mode) while playing a video to keep the screen onSUPPORT:- if something is not working in the internal web browser (FWL launch mode), try the same thing with another web browser and if there's still a problem, it might be a temporary Facebook issue- for any kind of problem or question, just send a feedback e-mail to the developer through the Android Market or with the specific button inside the appCOPYRIGHT:- Facebook is a trademark of Facebook, Inc.- this app is not made by Facebook, Inc., it's just an utility for Facebook users- the best effort has been made to respect all the copyright requirements, but in case you think there are some violations, just send an e-mail to the developer

reviews.title: Freaking Love it.
reviews.comment: Mobile & Desktop Version in one. Easy to use. Only reason I Put 4 & Not 5 is because we Can\'t Tag people in Statuses using @ . Only manual tag. But I love it. & it doesn\'t log you out or show when you log into an account that\'s logged in somewhere else. Nice!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good App
reviews.comment: Simple but good app, smooth n stable. Thumb up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy 3
reviews.comment: I\'m not afraid when updates come out for this version. Other fb is mainly unstable. You never know what you\'re getting.
reviews.author: kathy schuppe

reviews.title: Great app! A must to try
reviews.comment: 1 of the best ways to use fb on you phone. Easy to use & doesn\'t slow down your phone. Great app! Thanx guys

reviews.title: The best!!!!
reviews.comment: I love it.. Works perfectly, good job GREAT APP

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I love this! Bookmarking profile! Genius! And I can finally share photos from pages I like without having to wait forever for it to load to the desktop version then back to the mobile version! Genius! Fair loading speed. If this could upload photos and had notifications in the notification bar, it would be absolutely perfect!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is the one to use!!!!!  FIVE STARES *****\nI have tested all google or android market apps that promised and help cooping with misery of useing FB
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Much Better Than Face books App
reviews.comment: I love the speed, the ability to switch between mobile to desktop and the option to use a browser within the app. Please continue to improve on what you have already created! Thank you for giving us another option that is not a resource hog.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Does what it says, and does it well, ive never had problems with closing or not doing wwhat its ment to. I deffiently recomend this one if u need to get on the desktop verision of fb. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: optional!
reviews.comment: I think this app comes out with good job with 5 mins tested. Not many ads interrupting on page as same as other light mirror apps of FB i\'ve tried. What i like most is switching to desktop mode with more options i can use than mobile mode,such as to share,save, edit, and upload my album pics.  Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FB Ok App
reviews.comment: Needs more speed, takes a bit to load then when it does it goes into other stuff that you did not click on.  Only advantage is it has desktop view and it does not take up alot of memory on your phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Upload Pic?
reviews.comment: This app is amazing for me EXCEPT when it comes to uploading a picture. I can\'t upload any picture neither on mobile nor desktop feature..this bothers me a lot. Please fix this dev

reviews.title: Favorite

reviews.comment: Everytime I try to get back it goes off and I have to reopen it, WTF???......I wish it\'d back bottom and translator ..!!!
